Hope to see you on Friday at my open house! Please stop by my Antioch office anytime between 6:00 PM - 7:30 PM to hear what's going on in Washington and to share your views on issues important to you and our community. pic.twitter.com/HaK6Qkgpiz

This week in the world of science, two groundbreaking advances made the headlines. From the first image of a black hole to the discovery of a new human relative, this was only possible because of humanity’s innate drive to know more. pic.twitter.com/hEFIx9aTEh

Because of the hard work of some extraordinary scientists we are able to witness something that is truly amazing: the first picture of a black hole. We need to think about this as something bigger than ourselves. https://www.sciencenews.org/article/black-hole-first-picture-event-horizon-telescope …

The first 100 days of the 116th Congress have been focused on protecting the rights of voters, fighting #climatechange, ensuring LGBTQ rights, and protecting dreamers. I look forward to the work that will continue to be done throughout this Congress. #100DaysForThePeople
You called, wrote letters, attended town halls and made your voices heard. Today is a victory for free speech, democracy and above all the American people. #SaveTheNet pic.twitter.com/VEM4BR0eDi

The House of Representatives just passed the #SavetheNet Act! I’m proud to be an original cosponsor of this critical legislation that will restore strong #netneutrality protections for my constituents and all Americans.

The #SaveTheNet Act takes an approach that accounts for the internet of today and of tomorrow, and it provides certainty for Americans across the country. I'm proud to be an original cosponsor of this critical legislation, and I'll continue to fight to restore #NetNeutrality. pic.twitter.com/ob9D3mXBrQ

My @reddit AMA on #netneutrality and the Save the Internet Act will start at 8 PM EST, but you can submit your questions now. I'm looking forward to a great discussion! #SaveTheNet https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/comments/bb0hnm/i_am_congressman_jerry_mcnerney_ca09_i_am_a/?st=ju8yv1ki&sh=03b0833a …
I'll be hosting a @Reddit AMA on #NetNeutrality tonight from 8 to 9 PM EST. Hope you can join me! #SaveTheNet https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/

As a former wind energy engineer, I can tell you the president's recent claims are blatantly false. Wind is one of the lowest-priced sources of energy, and unlike fossil fuels, it produces no harmful emissions that contribute to #climatechange. https://mcnerney.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/rep-mcnerney-responds-to-president-trump-s-recent-windmill-claims …
Today is World Autism Day – a day to promote understanding and acceptance of people with autism and their unique strengths and challenges. #Congress4LIUB

#EqualPay is not just an issue for women. It impacts families, businesses and our economy. The House has passed the #PaycheckFairnessAct to ensure equal pay for equal work, and now it’s the Senate’s turn.

Unsafe levels of contamination in drinking water disproportionately affects vulnerable communities. The president’s #DirtyWaterRule will put the health of Americans across the country at further risk. Safe drinking water is a human right, & we must #ProtectCleanWater for all.

Trump’s #DirtyWaterRule will put the drinking water sources for tens of millions of people at risk, as well as the wetlands that communities rely on for flood protection. It's time to #ProtectCleanWater.
